code: public static String getStringFromInputStream(InputStream in) throws Exception {     CachedOutputStream bos = new CachedOutputStream().     IOUtils.copy(in, bos).     in.close().     bos.close().     return bos.getOut().toString(). }

public static void closeCamelUnitOfWork(Message message) {     Exchange cxfExchange.     if ((cxfExchange = message.getExchange()) != null) {         org.apache.camel.Exchange exchange = cxfExchange.get(org.apache.camel.Exchange.class).         if (exchange != null) {             UnitOfWorkHelper.doneUow(exchange.getUnitOfWork(), exchange).         }     } }
